frontmatter.title: Persist and Encrypt data in React Native applications
frontmatter.subtitle: A Guide to Protecting User Privacy and Securing Data Storage
frontmatter.description: Learn how to store data on a mobile device securely. This article explains how to set up persistent storage for your app using redux-persist encrypt your data using redux-persist-transform-encrypt.
frontmatter.keywords: react redux,persists,redux persist,reactnative,data encryption,react native redux,react native app,react native developer,redux persist react native,react native tutorial,example
